rule.description: Ungafaka lesethingi ngemenyu yekuchofota ngesekudla kunobe nguliphi likhasi lewebhu Nawufaka kusuka ekhasini lewebhu, i-URL yelikhasi lewebhu itawungetwa njengemtsetfo ngekuzenzakalela Ungahlela imitsetfo lekhonako ichazwe ngetansi. .

glob.title: Indlela ye glob isebentisa umtapo we {{1}} Sicela buka kusetjentiswa, noma ungasesha kusetjentiswa kwa {{2}}.

example.a: {{1}}, lehambisana nelikhasi lekucala le-YouTube kanye nawo onkhe emakhasi lamancane.

onlyForCurrentRule.title: Kusebenta kuphela kulomtsetfo lokhona nyalo:
onlyForCurrentRule.explain: Uma ihloliwe, ingasetjentiswa kuphela kumtsetfo lokhona nyalo, ngaphandle kwaloko yonkhe imitsetfo yemhlaba wonkhe ingasetjentiswa.
